instructions:
**Project Moon TRPG - Roll20 Sheet** - (version 0.4)

**Supported Languages:** English, 日本語, 한국어
This is a Roll20 character sheet and playing tool for Project Moon TRPG, a fan-made system based on the games and world setting of Project Moon.
The original system was created in Korean by helloing0119.

**Contact:** [Google Form](https://forms.gle/EMnjArzsgdpQJwfZ9) | [@punibird](https://twitter.com/punibird)

**PMTRPG Resources:** [Google Drive](https://drive.google.com/drive/u/2/folders/15nMYLz0sB5xWUiSOG4oN6IsteRJjpdZk)
[Rule Summary](https://docs.google.com/document/d/1MRk6HRD79pw-3-dcgteGgHIBAzdKVpDHRYIY5EFscE4/) | [Roll20 Sheet Guide](https://docs.google.com/document/d/1ok4-2vBbgH9jyBw05kGwsl0F96qrck4vmU9PO5kvoWU/)

useroptions.description: Set a password for Edit Mode access. Leave blank to allow anyone to use Edit Mode.
Paste Game Settings text data generated from Edit Mode, in order to apply to all sheets.
Paste Custom Ailments text data generated from Edit Mode, in order to apply to all sheets.
